review: This has changed our life. Having all these entertainment choices without having to plug our computer in to our tv has been phenomenal.

review: So easy to install. So far has every app I need.  We cancelled our cable subscription because we rarely watch TV and when we did it was a rented movie or Netflix.  We are Prime members so we now have access to lots of other movies.  Great purchase!!!!

review: Works very well and pretty easy to navigate
